Room.Name: West Hafnia Boulevard
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the main shopping district of the city of Hafnia.
Room.LongDescription: You are at the end of the shopping district. The city starts to calm down as you begin to reach its outskirts. To the north, you see a weapons shop and to the south, a polearms retailer. You are curious why such peaceful elves would be selling such deadly weapons.
